thread.title: United Airlines Houston-Munich: Ammunition dumped into a toilet
thread.title_full: United Airlines Houston-Munich: Ammunition dumped into a toilet

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: United Airlines Houston-Munich: Ammunition dumped into a toilet
text:
United Airlines Houston-Munich: Ammunition dumped into a toilet Adv: 
Jul 10, 2015 Adv: 
United Airlines is investigating an incident where a pilot dumped live ammunition down a toilet during an international flight from Houston to Munich, Germany in June 
Under federal law, a pilot is allowed to carry weapons, but only in the United States.Eligible crew members are not allowed to bring firearms or ammunition when flying outside the United States or when not on duty. 
This United Airlines pilot disposed ammunition into a toilet on this international flight. He remains employed by the airline
